channel.title: Publication on Bublabs
channel.description: Recent content in Publication on Bublabs

item.title: New Publication on FEA for Plant-Based Meat
item.description: We publish in Physics of Fluids on how finite element modeling can advance the texture of plant-based meat.

item.title: New Publication on Green Extraction of Food Bioactives
item.description: We publish in Food Chemistry on green extraction of bioactive compounds from food by-products.
